summary: Provides a data descriptor for intent and slot classification tasks, handling ingestion of raw annotation files and dictionary CSVs, aligning sentences with their intent and slot labels, converting textual labels to numeric indices, applying default none-slot labels and optional padding, and exposing utilities for label-index mapping and class weight computation.
business_intent: Facilitates preparation of labeled datasets for training conversational AI models that perform intent detection and slot filling, streamlining data preprocessing and balancing for improved model performance.
